Description: Calcite vase: tall vase with concave sides, flaring at the top. The base is flat on both the interior and exterior, and the rim is plain. Approximately one-third of the vase is missing and has been restored with plaster.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. B. Emery, 'Great tombs of the First Dynasty; excavations at Sakkara' III (London, 1958), pl. 104d, lower row, third from left.
